snippet: The actress and writer Michelle Morgan talks about the arc of her career and how “Bridesmaids,” starring Kristen Wiig, paved the way for her new film, “Girl Most Likely.”
abstract: Excerpts from conversation with actress and writer Michelle Morgan, who talks about arc of her career and how her latest film Girl Most Likely benefited from meteoric rise of its star, Kristen Wiig.
lead_paragraph: The actress and writer Michelle Morgan talks about the arc of her career and how “Bridesmaids,” starring Kristen Wiig, paved the way for her new film, “Girl Most Likely.”

headline.seo: Kristen Wiig Helped Greenlight Michelle Morgan’s Script
headline.main: A Writer Hitching Her Star to a Star
headline.print_headline: A Writer Hitching Her Star to a Star
